title: Pepper Planted Steak
instructions: Remove the planted.steak from packaging and pat dry. Generously coat both sides with crushed black peppercorns, pressing them firmly into the surface.
Heat a cast-iron skillet over high heat until smoking. Add olive oil and a knob of vegan butter.
Sear the planted.steak for 2-3 minutes per side until a deep golden crust forms.
Remove the steak and let rest. In the same pan, add minced shallots and cook until softened.
Deglaze with brandy or cognac (or vegetable stock), then add plant-based cream and a touch of Dijon mustard.
Simmer the peppercorn sauce until slightly thickened, about 2 minutes.
Slice the planted.steak, drizzle generously with the pepper sauce, and serve with crispy fries or mashed potatoes.
